name: Yes, Grandma
description:
Controls

  • Move with Left/Right Arrow keys or A and D
  • Go up stairs with up arrow or W
  • Go down stairs with down arrow or S
  • Interact with people and items using Space

Gameplay tips

  • Knock Out pedestrians with one punch
  • Drag their unconscious bodies around
  • Stash them in closets and recycle bins
  • Turn lights on and off with light switches

Follow Grandma's instructions and don't get caught!
